botan.cert.cvc.cvc_self

CVC Self-Signed Certificate

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

struct EAC11CVCOptions;
This class represents a set of options used for the creation of CVC certificates

EAC11CVC createSelfSignedCert(in PrivateKey key, in EAC11CVCOptions opt, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create a selfsigned CVCA

Params:
PrivateKey key the ECDSA private key to be used to sign the certificate
EAC11CVCOptions opt used to set several parameters. Necessary are: car, holder_auth_templ, hash_alg, ced, cex and hash_alg
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use

Returns:
the self signed certificate

EAC11Req createCvcReq(in PrivateKey key, in ASN1Chr chr, in string hash_alg, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create a CVC request. The key encoding will be according to the provided private key.

Params:
PrivateKey key the private key associated with the requesting entity
ASN1Chr chr the chr to appear in the certificate (to be provided without sequence number)
string hash_alg the string defining the hash algorithm to be used for the creation of the signature
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use

Returns:
the new request

EAC11ADO createAdoReq(in PrivateKey key, in EAC11Req req, in ASN1Car car, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create an ADO from a request object.

Params:
PrivateKey key the private key used to sign the ADO
EAC11Req req the request forming the body of the ADO
ASN1Car car the CAR forming the body of the ADO, i.e. the CHR of the entity associated with the provided private key
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use

EAC11CVC createCvca(in PrivateKey key, in string hash, in ASN1Car car, bool iris, bool fingerpr, uint cvca_validity_months, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create a CVCA certificate.

Params:
PrivateKey key the private key associated with the CVCA certificate to be created
string hash the string identifying the hash algorithm to be used for signing the certificate to be created
ASN1Car car the CAR of the certificate to be created
bool iris indicates whether the entity associated with the certificate shall be entitled to read the biometrical iris image
bool fingerpr indicates whether the entity associated with the certificate shall be entitled to read the biometrical fingerprint image
uint cvca_validity_months length of time in months this will be valid
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

Returns:
the CVCA certificate created

EAC11CVC linkCvca(in EAC11CVC signer, in PrivateKey key, in EAC11CVC signee, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create a link certificate between two CVCA certificates. The key encoding will be implicitCA.

Params:
EAC11CVC signer the cvca certificate associated with the signing entity
PrivateKey key the private key associated with the signer
EAC11CVC signee the certificate which whose CAR/CHR will be the holder of the link certificate
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

EAC11Req createCVCReqImplicitca(PrivateKey prkey, in ASN1Chr chr, in string hash_alg, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create a CVC request. The key encoding will be implicitCA.

Params:
PrivateKey prkey the private key associated with the requesting entity
ASN1Chr chr the chr to appear in the certificate (to be provided without sequence number)
string hash_alg the string defining the hash algorithm to be used for the creation of the signature
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

Returns:
the new request

EAC11CVC signRequest(in EAC11CVC signer_cert, in PrivateKey key, in EAC11Req signee, uint seqnr, uint seqnr_len, bool domestic, uint dvca_validity_months, uint ca_is_validity_months, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Sign a CVC request.

Params:
EAC11CVC signer_cert the certificate of the signing entity
PrivateKey key the private key of the signing entity
EAC11Req signee the request to be signed
uint seqnr the sequence number of the certificate to be created
uint seqnr_len the number of digits the sequence number will be encoded in
bool domestic indicates whether to sign a domestic or a foreign certificate. Set to true for domestic
uint dvca_validity_months validity period in months
uint ca_is_validity_months validity period in months
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

Returns:
the new certificate
